TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITransformProvider

summary.span: 公开一些方法和属性，以支持 UI 自动化客户端访问可移动、调整大小或在二维空间中旋转的控件。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须支持的 UI 自动化提供程序上实现控件模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. 对此控件模式的支持并不限于桌面上的对象。Support for this control pattern is not limited to objects on the desktop. 只要子级可以移动、 调整大小或容器的边界内自由地旋转，则还必须由容器对象的子级的实现此控件模式。This control pattern must also be implemented by the children of a container object as long as the children can be moved, resized, or rotated freely within the boundaries of the container.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Move (double x, double y);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Move(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Sub Move (x As Double, y As Double)
public: void Move(double x, double y);
abstract member Move : double * double -> unit

param.name: x
param.span: 此控件左侧的绝对屏幕坐标。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

param.name: y
param.span: 此控件顶部的绝对屏幕坐标。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.
Moves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转，以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动的容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放在尽可能靠近尽可能与顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内的请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了此方法对于可以移动一个自定义控件的一种可能的实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that can be moved. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Move](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#move)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Move](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#move)]

span.span: If the property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Resize (double width, double height);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Resize(float64 width, float64 height) cil managed
Public Sub Resize (width As Double, height As Double)
public: void Resize(double width, double height);
abstract member Resize : double * double -> unit

param.name: width
param.span: 窗口的新宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

param.name: height
param.span: 窗口的新高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.
Resizes the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用控件上时支持拆分窗格中，此方法可以具有其他相邻窗格调整大小的副作用。When called on a control that supports split panes, this method can have the side effect of resizing other contiguous panes. 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转，以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动的容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放在尽可能靠近尽可能与顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内的请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了此方法对于自定义控件可调整大小的一种可能的实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that can be resized. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Resize](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#resize)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Resize](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#resize)]

span.span: If the property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Rotate (double degrees);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Rotate(float64 degrees) cil managed
Public Sub Rotate (degrees As Double)
public: void Rotate(double degrees);
abstract member Rotate : double -> unit

param.name: degrees

span.span: The number of degrees to rotate the control.

param.span: 正数会顺时针旋转；负数会逆时针旋转。

span.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.
Rotates the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转，以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动的容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放在尽可能靠近尽可能与顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内的请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了此方法对于在无法旋转的自定义控件的一种可能的实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that cannot be rotated. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Rotate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#rotate)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Rotate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#rotate)]
